section.head: PHILOSOPHY OF HISTORY
section.para: The nature of historical explanation. P.L. Gardiner. Oxford B.Litt. 1950.
Historical explanation. C.B. McCullagh. Cambridge Ph.D. 1965.
An analysis of historical knowledge. A.R. Louch. Cambridge Ph.D. 1956.
An idealist conception of history. E.J. Widdows. Bristol M.A. 1922.
The theory of sovereignty in history. W.D. Handcock. Bristol M.A. 1926.
Some aspects of explanation and interpretation in history. W.H. Dray. Oxford D.Phil. 1956.
The language and purpose of narrative history. M.A. Kramer. Oxford D.Phil. 1957.
History, literature, social science and philosophy of history: some aspects of their interrelations. N.M.L. Wharton. Leeds Ph.D. 1967.
Karl Popper's ideas on history. Cynthia R. MacL. Hay. Edinburgh Ph.D. 1969.
